titleStmt.title: The conquering virgin: or, The maiden triumph; to an excellent new air. The may be printed R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden Ball in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher's name and date from Wing.
Verse: "We all to conquering beauty bow ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
